subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*r(u/i)m||dark; shade; dusk; twilight}}; compare {{cog|bo|རུམ||darkness}}, {{cog|kac|rim||to be dusk}} ({{zh-ref|Benedict, 1972}}; {{zh-ref|Bodman, 1980}}; STEDT).

{{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} compares it instead to {{cog|my|အုံ့||to become overcast}}, {{cog|adi|mugyum||shade; shadow}}, {{cog|lep|tr=so-dyŭm|t=shade}}.
